meanings.sent1: Yesterday, we subwayed to the museum for a fun day out.
meanings.sent2: She subwayed to work every morning to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The family subwayed to the park, but forgot their picnic basket!
meanings.sent4: After getting lost, they subwayed their way back to familiar streets.
meanings.sent5: The tourists subwayed around the city, taking in all the sights.

meanings.definition: To construct or navigate a subway system.
meanings.sent1: The city subwayed new tunnels to connect different neighborhoods.
meanings.sent2: Engineers carefully subwayed the underground passages to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The workers subwayed through the night to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the complex subwayed network required a skilled guide.
meanings.sent5: The team subwayed the maze of tunnels with precision and expertise.
